name: irm_plus_lnm
description: IRM and LNM enabled together: insert mode shifts chars, newline does CR+LF
comment: CSI 4 h (IRM on), CSI 20 h (LNM on), print ABCDE at row 0 cols 0-4, CUP home, insert X at col 0 (shifts ABCDE right -> XABCDE), LF with LNM does CR+LF to (1,0), insert Y at (1,0); cursor at (1,1)
